thread.title: Jordan Ayew's manager at Aston Villa admits to having sleepless nights with side's stuttering form
thread.title_full: Jordan Ayew's manager at Aston Villa admits to having sleepless nights with side's stuttering form

title: Jordan Ayew's manager at Aston Villa admits to having sleepless nights with side's stuttering form
text:
19:40 CET Jordan Ayew's manager at Aston Villa admits to having sleepless nights with side's stuttering form - www.ghanasoccernet.com Tim Sherwood with Jordan Ayew 
Jordan Ayew's manager at Aston Villa Tim Sherwood admits he is having sleepless nights with the poor form of his team in the Premier League. 
Villa are enduring one of their worst starts ever to the Premier League campaign with just four points to show in eight games. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
